Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First lets list out all the activities and their sequence from the scenario description identifying the main flow CR DV FC CA AP P N CL with loops for RDS after DV and II after FC

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Discusses ambiguity in Approval AP conditional on threshold infers possible choice after CA either AP then P or direct to P but lacks specification for else path

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Assumes Approval AP is mandatory step in sequence to simplify model following listed steps CR DV RDS loop FC II loop CA AP P N CL

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Defines places as states between activities like pstart pacr pdvok pdvincomplete pfcok pfc doubt etc and transitions labeled with activity names deriving arcs from sequence and loops

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Refines model multiple times adjusting places for loops like after RDS back to before DV pacr and after II back to before FC pdvok correcting flow for redoing activities

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Explains Petri net choice modeling using two transitions from same input place both labeled same activity DV or FC leading to ok or incomplete doubt paths as nondeterministic choice

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Confirms structure with initial marking at pstart final at pcl loops for DV RDS and FC II enabled multiple times main path to closure

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Plans Python code creation adding places transitions arcs markings using pm4py constructs matching the finalized net structure
